name: Ghoulf
description:
GHOULF is a third-person isometric minigolf-esque puzzle game, where the player helps a poor soul who got misplaced in Hell to reunite with its body and successfully escape from Hell.

This project was made as part of the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. All assets were made by the team during the 48 hour game jam.

CONTROLS:
Left-click & drag - aim shot.
Release Left-click - to shoot.
WASD - move camera.
R - reset previous shot.
T - reset level.
X - reset camera.
